queue.name: Workspace Blank Page Crash
queue.description: Workspace page crashes and shows blank when loading
symptoms: Click Workspace in nav → blank page
Page was working before recent ServerManager/Workspace changes
debug_steps: Check browser console for JavaScript errors
Look for missing imports or undefined variables
queue.likely_cause: Recent changes to ServerManager.jsx or Workspace.jsx introduced error

queue.name: Create Project Button Hidden
queue.description: Create Project button at bottom of wizard is cut off/hidden
queue.location: Create Project page, Step 5 (MCP Servers), bottom action bar
queue.fix: Action bar should be sticky/fixed at bottom, or page needs proper scrolling
queue.test: Create Project button fully visible and clickable

queue.name: Terminal WebSocket Connection
queue.description: Terminal shows 'Connecting...' but never connects to VPS
queue.context: VPS is connected in Settings (206.189.78.115), project is linked, but terminal WebSocket fails
debug_steps: Check backend logs for connection attempts
Check if SSH credentials are being retrieved
queue.test: Terminal connects and shows real bash prompt from DO server

notes.recent_changes: ServerManager.jsx, Workspace.jsx, WorkspaceTopBar.jsx were modified - likely source of BUG-01
notes.vps_info: User's DO server: 206.189.78.115, connected in Settings > VPS Connections
